name: BIGCAP
description: BIGCAP aims to grow into a decentralized, transparent Celsius, where anybody can participate in helping grow the treasury. With BIGCAP, individuals can trade portions of a collective treasury, while the treasury retains protection of its assets through loss recovery tools that minimize negative outcomes. The top traders get a cut of the total profits and win NFTs, custom rewards, and special level-ups. Through the use of smart contracts, BIGCAP provides a secure, transparent, and decentralized mechanism for individuals to collectively accumulate assets.
